title: Where Next?: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Nov. 24, 2025

title: New NPM supply-chain attack compromises major ENS and crypto libraries
contentSnippet: A researcher warned that more than 400 NPM libraries — including at least 10 crypto packages, mostly tied to ENS — were compromised by the Shai Hulud malware.

title: Revolut Hits $75B Valuation in Fundraise Backed by Coatue, NVIDIA, Fidelity
contentSnippet: Revolut is growing its crypto offerings, including a recent partnership with Polygon Labs and a MiCA license to offer crypto services across Europe.

title: Solana Holders Under Pressure as Sell-Off Deepens
contentSnippet: With 80% of SOL holders underwater and $239M in longs at risk, analysts warn of panic selling but see long-term value in ETF inflows.

title: Crypto Markets Today: Fear Dominates as Altcoins Lag, Bitcoin Tests Key Levels
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s struggle to reclaim the $90,000 range leaves the broader crypto market vulnerable, with altcoins suffering sharp liquidity-driven underperformance.

title: Strategy stock is bleeding, but Saylor ‘won’t back down’ from Bitcoin bet
contentSnippet: Despite a steep drop in its share price, Strategy’s Bitcoin stack is in the green and it continues to outperform top tech equities over time.

title: Bitcoin Longs on Bitfinex Jump 40% in Three Months as Traders Double Down on Dip
contentSnippet: Rising margin bitcoin longs show confidence despite bitcoins ongoing correction.

title: ECB Doubles Down on Warning That Stablecoins Could Pose Global Financial Risks
contentSnippet: The EU’s central bank says stablecoins draw value from eurozone banks and could pose a risk to global financial stability.

title: China Returns as Third Largest Bitcoin Mining Hub With a 14% Share: Reuters
contentSnippet: Underground activity expands as cheap power, miner demand and softer policy signals support a renewed mining push in key provinces in China.

title: Thief Posing as Delivery Driver Ties Up Homeowner, Steals $11M in Crypto
contentSnippet: The incident in San Francisco adds to a record year of physical attacks on crypto holders, with cases averaging one a week.

title: Pump.fun’s massive $436M cash-out turns heads as memecoin mania fades
contentSnippet: A decline in speculative crypto investor appetite has seen Pump.fun’s revenue fall by 50% since October, raising concerns about incoming selling pressure.

title: Animoca Brands Wins Initial Abu Dhabi Approval to Operate Regulated Fund
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands received in-principle approval from Abu Dhabi’s FSRA to operate as a regulated fund manager within ADGM.

title: Bitkub exchange eyes Hong Kong IPO as Thai markets slump to 5-year lows: Report
contentSnippet: With Thailand’s markets in turmoil, Bitkub is shifting toward Hong Kong’s thriving equity market for a $200 million IPO raise, Bloomberg reported.

title: Grayscale Dogecoin, XRP Trusts Go Live, Cleanspark Earnings: Crypto Week Ahead
contentSnippet: Your look at what's coming in the week starting Nov. 24.

title: Death cross vs. $96K rebound: 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
contentSnippet: Bitcoin bulls began to eye higher BTC price levels as sentiment reversed to the upside ahead of a turbulent macroeconomic data week.

title: ブラックロック、ビットコイン投資の本質は「デジタルゴールド」　機関投資家が重視する“真の価値”とは？
contentSnippet: 世界最大の資産運用会社ブラックロックのデジタル資産部門責任者が、機関投資家がビットコインに投資する理由を解説した。「デジタルゴールド」としての価値保存機能が重視される一方、決済手段としての利用は依然投機的との見方を示した。

title: Thai Crypto Exchange Bitkub Weighs Hong Kong IPO: Report
contentSnippet: Thailand-based Bitkub is considering an IPO in Hong Kong to raise approximately $200 million.

title: $80K Bitcoin Put Now Most Popular Bet
contentSnippet: The $80K BTC put is now the most popular options play on Deribit.

title: Bitcoin climb to continue as selling pressure eases: Analysts
contentSnippet: Bitcoin showed signs of recovery after nearing $82,000 on Friday, with analysts noting easing selling pressure and rising Fed rate cut expectations.

title: Buterin says X’s new location feature ‘risky’ as crypto users flag privacy concerns
contentSnippet: Uniswap founder Hayden Adams said X's new feature showing the country that an account is based in was a form of “mandatory doxing.”

title: Bitcoin open interest dives, but bottom could see ‘renewed bullish trend’
contentSnippet: Bitcoin open interest has seen a sharp decline in the last month, which one analyst says could form a “solid bottom” for it to climb back from.

title: Department of Government Efficiency Winds Down Despite Months Left To Run: Report
contentSnippet: The administration’s DOGE office has gone dormant months early as the White House weighs easier paths to close federal units.

title: JPMorgan Chase Ends Banking Ties With Strike CEO, Rekindling Crypto Debanking Concerns
contentSnippet: JPMorgan Chase’s move has renewed scrutiny of alleged anti-crypto debanking despite a Trump order banning the practice.

title: Rising crypto token value capture may fuel 2026 rebound: Bitwise CIO
contentSnippet: Bitwise’s Matt Hougan says tokens are getting better at returning value to holders, and Ethereum's Fusako upgrade could “increase token value capture.”

title: Bitcoin Logs Longest Losing Streak Since 2024 as Fed Repricing Fuels Cautious Rebound
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's longest weekly slump in over a year puts it on track for its worst quarter since 2018, with a potential bull trap looming.

title: VanEck boss questions Bitcoin’s privacy, encryption against quantum tech
contentSnippet: Jan van Eck says quantum computing could threaten Bitcoin's encryption and privacy, and his firm “will walk away” if it’s “fundamentally broken.”

title: ソラナのインフレ率を下げる改善提案　今後6年で2,230万SOLの発行量削減見込む
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ソラナのコミュニティがインフレ減少率を引き上げる改善提案を公開した。目標インフレ率への到達が6年から3年に短縮する見込みだ。

title: Bitwise CIO Says Most DATs Are Headed for Discounts, Not Premiums: Here's Why
contentSnippet: Bitwise's Hougan argues that structural drag in DATs outweighs the few uncertain paths firms have to lift their crypto-per-share.

title: 「仮想通貨市場の弱体化、背景にマーケットメーカーの機能不全」トム・リーが指摘
contentSnippet: ビットマイン会長が仮想通貨市場の下落が続いている要因を分析した。10月10日の清算イベントがマーケットメーカーを機能不全にしていると見解を示している。

title: Why This Billionaire Collector Continues to Buy NFTs in 2025
contentSnippet: Businessman Adam Weitsman recently doubled down on NFTs with a record Meebits purchase, and says he’s never sold an NFT—and doesn’t plan to.

title: Satoshi Nakamoto's Bitcoin Wealth Falls By $41 Billion, Now Poorer Than Bill Gates
contentSnippet: Satoshi Nakamoto's Bitcoin-based net worth took a heavy hit as BTC dropped more than 30% from its all-time high set in October.

title: What Is a Layer-1 Blockchain? The Base Layer Powering Bitcoin and Crypto
contentSnippet: Layer-1 blockchains are the base networks that secure and record every crypto transaction, powering Bitcoin, Ethereum, and beyond.

title: More Ready Than Bitcoin? How Zcash Developers Are Preparing for the Quantum Threat
contentSnippet: Quantum computers could threaten much more than just Bitcoin, but developers behind the surging Zcash say they aren't panicking. Here's why.

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、ヴィタリック紹介のイーサリアム新ツールやXRPのステーキング導入案など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナなど主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: ビットコイン売られ過ぎでも反転せず、12月FOMCの据え置きが現実味を増す｜bitbankアナリスト寄稿
contentSnippet: 今週のBTC対円相場は1400万円割れまで下落。ヌビディア好決算後も1400万円割れが続き、米雇用統計の強弱まちまちな内容が見通し悪化を助長。12月FOMCでの金利据え置き観測が強まる。

title: 週刊仮想通貨ニュース｜金融庁の暗号資産規制方針やビットコイン採掘割合の95%到達に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は、金融庁の仮想通貨規制方針、ビットコイン採掘割合の95%到達、ビットコインとイーサリアムの市況分析に関する記事が関心を集めた。

title: ANAPホールディングス、企業向けビットコイン戦略支援「ビットコイン道場」を開始
contentSnippet: ANAPホールディングスが企業のビットコイン活用を支援する継続型プログラム「ANAPビットコイン道場」の提供を開始した。会計や税務などの実務を専門家が包括的にサポートし、参加企業がコミュニティ形式で課題解決に取り組む仕組みを提供する。

title: コンヴァノがビットコイン戦略から本業回帰、AI・ヘルスケア事業に注力へ
contentSnippet: コンヴァノが仮想通貨ビットコインを最大約2万BTC取得する計画を取り下げ、成長中の事業へ軸足を移す。業績予想を上方修正しており本業成長を重視する戦略転換となる。

title: 米当局がビットメイン製品を国家安全保障リスクで調査、トランプ関連企業も1万6000台使用
contentSnippet: 米国土安全保障省が中国メーカーのビットメインを調査し、機器がスパイ活動や電力網破壊に使用される可能性を指摘。トランプ大統領の息子たちの会社アメリカン・ビットコインも1万6000台を購入した。

title: コインベース、ソラナのミームコイン取引所「ベクター」を買収
contentSnippet: コインベースがソラナ基盤SocialFiプラットフォーム「ベクター・ファン」を買収すると発表した。年内に取引完了予定で、ソラナエコシステムへの参入を拡大し、すべてを取引できる取引所の構築を目指す。
